subtitle.Text: One of the larger assets that we needed for the basement to really give it character and personality was a furnace,
and when we were initially thinking of the furnace Steve had mentioned to me the furnace from Home Alone, which if you’re from,
if you grew up in the 90s like I did you know exactly what I’m talking about.
So I did a lot of research and looked up stuff that could kind of evoke a similar feeling and we finally settled upon on octopus furnaces,
which are like, thematically and time wise very appropriate.
They’re these giant hulking monstrosities with all these arms covered in asbestos - really perfect -
so we ended up modelling one of those, and put it in the corner and I think it turned out okay.
